    • lbRadioRecordingsForArtist

      public LbCoreApi.APIlbRadioRecordingsForArtistRequest lbRadioRecordingsForArtist(UUID seedArtistMbid, Mode mode, Integer maxSimilarArtists, Integer maxRecordingsPerArtist, Integer popBegin, Integer popEnd)
      Get recordings for use in LB radio with the given seed artist. The endpoint returns a dict of all the similar artists, including the seed artist. For each artists, there will be a list of dicts that contain recording_mbid, similar_artist_mbid and total_listen_count.
      Parameters:
      seedArtistMbid - (required)
      mode - The mode that LB radio should use. Must be easy, medium or hard. (required)
      maxSimilarArtists - The maximum number of similar artists to return recordings for. (required)
      maxRecordingsPerArtist - The maximum number of recordings to return for each artist. If there are arenâ€™t enough recordings, all available recordings will be returned. (required)
      popBegin - Popularity range percentage lower bound. A popularity range is given to narrow down the recordings into a smaller target group. The most popular recording(s) on LB have a pop percent of 100. The least popular recordings have a score of 0. This range is not coupled to the specified mode, but the mode would often determine the popularity range, so that less popular recordings can be returned on the medium and harder modes. (required)
      popEnd - Popularity range percentage upper bound. (required)
      Returns:
      APIlbRadioRecordingsForArtistRequest
      Http Response Details:
      Status Code Description Response Headers
      200 Yay, you have data! -
      400 Invalid or missing param in request. -

    • lbRadioTags

      public LbCoreApi.APIlbRadioTagsRequest lbRadioTags(String tag, Integer popBegin, Integer popEnd, Integer count)
      Get recordings for use in LB radio with the specified tags that match the requested criteria.
      Parameters:
      tag - The MusicBrainz tag to fetch recordings for, this parameter can be specified multiple times. if more than one tag is specified, the operator param should also be specified. (required)
      popBegin - Popularity range percentage lower bound. A popularity range is given to narrow down the recordings into a smaller target group. The most popular recording(s) on LB have a pop percent of 100. The least popular recordings have a score of 0. This range is not coupled to the specified mode, but the mode would often determine the popularity range, so that less popular recordings can be returned on the medium and harder modes. (required)
      popEnd - Popularity range percentage upper bound. (required)
      count - Optional, number of listens to return. (required)
      Returns:
      APIlbRadioTagsRequest
      Http Response Details:
      Status Code Description Response Headers
      200 Yay, you have data! -
      400 Invalid or missing param in request. -

    • recommendationPlaylistsForUser

      public LbCoreApi.APIrecommendationPlaylistsForUserRequest recommendationPlaylistsForUser(String playlistUserName)
      Fetch recommendation playlist metadata in JSPF format without recordings for 'playlist_user_name'. This endpoint only lists playlists that are to be shown on the listenbrainz.org recommendations pages.
      Parameters:
      playlistUserName - (required)
      Returns:
      APIrecommendationPlaylistsForUserRequest
      Http Response Details:
      Status Code Description Response Headers
      200 Success. -
      404 User not found. -
